Summary: Wife and I observed reddish light move toward us from the NW, hover for a few minutes and then retreat rapidly to the north
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I observed a bright reddish light approach us from the north west on the evening of Feb 10,2102 at approximately 7:45 PM. It hovered for a few minutes and then rapidly accelerate to the north. No emissions, or appendages were observed. 2 photos and a sketch are included. The photos were taken using a 5x telephoto Canon digital camera. The sketch was as it appeared to me through binoculars.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Parker
There was one other sighting in Parker on or around February 10th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
